columns.name: ConfigurationId
columns.description: Unique identifier for a specific configuration

columns.name: ConfigurationRationale
columns.description: Description of any associated risks and rationale behind the configuration

columns.name: ConfigurationCategory
columns.description: Category or grouping to which the configuration belongs

columns.name: BenchmarkProfileLevels
columns.description: List of benchmark compliance levels for which the configuration is applicable

columns.name: CCEReference
columns.description: Unique Common Configuration Enumeration (CCE) identifier for the configuration

columns.name: RemediationOptions
columns.description: Recommended actions to reduce or address any associated risks

columns.name: Source
columns.description: The registry path or other location used to determine the current device setting

columns.name: RecommendedValue
columns.description: Set of expected values for the current device setting to be compliant
